column5: Would solve a lot of headaches at the ramp... and you don't need to find a parking spot for your tow vehicle.
Damn... I just ordered a Rebel

Leah just asked me to modify her steel boat.. so she can drive up the boat ramp and then to the grocery store..  Sounds like a challenge to me... slap a slow moving vehicle sign on it and have at 'er.. lol
i bet Troy on Swamp People could use a boat like that.
What, it doesn't fly too, what good is it?  Pretty neat that's for sure
I could just picture someone driving it down the road half pickled...
Awesome.  Needs a spot for a trolling motor.
